text: Khakhar is an Indian name. It may refer to: *Bhupen Khakhar (1934–2003), Indian artist *Devang Vipin Khakhar (born 1959), Indian chemical engineer *Piyush Khakhar (born 1965), Indian cricketer *Sameer Khakhar, Indian actor ==See also== * Khakhara, Uttar Pradesh, India * Khakkhara. a staff traditionally carried by Buddhist monks * Kharkhari, Dhanbad, Jharkhand, India Category:Indian masculine given names
title: Khakhar
